cleaned_text: Herbal Detox Protocols are specifically formulated for every disease and illness, using only the highest quality organic heirloom herbs, roots and seeds that we personally grow, right here in our Plant Nursery. Our Protocol ONE is specific to help heal almost all diseases and illnesses which are listed within this protocols page including vaccine removal, vaccine injuries, vaccine shedding and covid long haul symptoms. If you do not see your specific illness or disease listed, please refer to our PROTOCOL ONE or contact us
